name: Troll Thief Puzzle
description:
A brain teaser game for you!
Become a smart crafty thief in the game and try to steal everything he wants! You are a thief with elastic hands, so you can steal it easily.
Each level is a thief puzzle to solve, maybe steal something, or just tease somebody! Use his magic elastic hand smartly to solve the thief puzzle.

GAME FEATURE:
- Easy game with simple gameplay
- Similar stickman characters
- Hundred of funny and tricky thief puzzles
- A brain teaser game
- No time limit
